name: Rolando The Magestic
description: Rolando the Majestic will have the player take the role of Rolando, a thief of white glove thirsty for revenge. Set in New York around the 1930s, Rolando begins his story as a white glove thief, using his powers to steal high value items from high profile targets. As his infamy grows, he takes on a job where he bites more than he can chew and ends up being blackmailed by the Palazzo, a dangerous and powerful crime family. With his life on the line, he must deliver large amounts of valuable items to his new bosses every week or risk becoming another name of the Palazzo’s long list of victims. During a job he discovers an artifact that improves his abilities, this lights a spark of hope for his survival which becomes his new objective. If he can track and recover more artifacts to improve his abilities, he might be able to escape the clutches of the Palazzos.
